description:
Kid Summers is an adventurer who hold records for the quickest trip around the world in a hot-air balloon, the deepest one-man submarine dive as well as the longest independent space walk.
Kid Summers introduced herself to Ash after he defeated her and her Manyula in the final round of the Hero of the Wave tournament held at Aldoran Castle. Like all girls, Brock was instantly in love but Max quickly dragged him away before they could continue their introductions. Brock later asked Kid Summers to dance at the ball where she agreed to dance to Brock`s delight.
She traveled with Ash and his friends in her all-terain vehicle to the Tree of World`s Origin. She stayed in contact with Banks the entire time so that she could get update and record the events. In the end though, she decided not to publicize the story about the events that happened that day though.
name: Kid Summers
